title: Shepard Fairey Hope Screen Print 2008 Edition 450/500 Hand Signed
description:
SHEPARD FAIREY - "Hope" Limited Edition Screen Print (2008)

This iconic work by Shepard Fairey became one of the most recognized images in American political history. Created during the 2008 presidential campaign, this piece exemplifies the artist's signature stencil style and has become a defining symbol of contemporary political art.

DETAILS:
• Artist: Shepard Fairey
• Title: Hope
• Medium: Screen Print on Cream Speckletone Paper
• Size: 24" x 36"
• Edition: 450/500
• Year: 2008
• Condition: Excellent

CONDITION NOTES:
• No visible damage, tears, or repairs
• Colors remain vibrant with no fading
• Edges clean and crisp
• Stored flat in acid-free materials

AUTHENTICITY:
• Hand-signed by artist in pencil lower right
• Edition numbering consistent with Obey Giant records
• Paper stock and ink consistent with 2008 production run
• Includes certificate of authenticity

PROVENANCE:

• Single owner collection
• Exhibition history available upon request

SHIPPING:
